Description: Student cannot perform any movement isolated (by himself)
Student can perform a sequence of 2-4 steps on his own
Student can continue through warm up sections and repetition of diagonal steps without encouragement from the teacher
Student can deomnstrate by himself steps of the diagonal and volunteer parts of the choreography when asked by the teacher
Student can demonstrate the warm up, diagonal steps and all of the choreography by himself with confidence and no prompts
Student can verbally explain movement in the warm up, diagonal and choreography
Student demonstrates confidence as a person and dancer through extending full use of body in space
